Description: The metering unit shall be equipped with a cumulative counter and display at least 7 integer digits and 3 decimal digits.
The metering unit shall have a terminal cover that covers the connection cable layer.
The metric value recorded and stored in the HES shall be unadulterated, i.e. exactly the same value as recorded by the Metering Unit.
The date and system time shall be recorded for each logged record.

Feature: Energy values to other system within 10 sec
Description: The energy values (15-minute values) shall be exportable from HES via integrations to other systems within 10 seconds after registration in HES.
